about_the_game:
This is a simple, yet groovy, puzzle game. The rule: fill a board to make a complete line. Both horizontal AND vertical line are fine. They get removed from the board so that you can keep playing.

Features:

You feel the groove, and so do blocks!

If you do well, the music evolves, and the blocks even start dancing to the tune!?? Keep the board clean and score a long combo!

Use skill to get out of a tricky situation!

The previously removed lines come and help you in the form of 'skills'! Using the skills, you can blast that one pesky block hindering your progress.

You vs. the board. The duel gets more intense!

The board will push you back! The blocks start to harden, randomly yeet themselves out of the board, etc. Don't let the board get itself messy!

How far can you score in three minutes?

The base mode is Timer mode. You have three minutes to place as many pieces and complete as many lines as possible. Depending on your performance, you get a rank after the time is over. Can you get an S rank?

Keep the combo rolling or risk a shutdown!

If racking up scores is cumbersome, there's the score survival mode. If you don't fill lines as often as possible, you'll run out of HP and it's an instant game over! Now how many pieces can you manage to place on the board?

Relax or challenge your limit?

If all those pressures are vexing you, we have the Zen mode, in which you don't have any rules that might cut your game short. Instead, you literally try your hardest (and best of luck) to score as much as you possibly can.

Leaderboard!

Features a leaderboard! Compete with others with various game modes!

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 13 Ventura
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 15 Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Use of a headphone recommended.

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: A simple puzzle game? Well, this is a groovy puzzle game. Fill a board with blocks to make a complete line, remove them, and rinse and repeat. Great plays will be rewarded with increasingly evolving music, and you'll soon start to groove with the very blocks you're placing down!?
